## Source: amazon-inspector (f921f8e8c11a044b483aa7c500c15b42917baa7ef4489b8301c564088fd4b7e3)
The package blobhunter-depconf-poc was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e86eec93623f868cd6b6974b56152c2691dbf38308a3b580a1eae1999364c1ff)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'blobhunter-depconf-poc' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
